article_metadata.description: Huntsville, Ala., attorney Joe Ritch will become the first Alabama chairman of the Tennessee Valley Authority in May when he succeeds Knoxville businessman Bill Sansom as head of TVA's current 8-member board.

og.description: Huntsville, Ala., attorney Joe Ritch will become the first Alabama chairman of the Tennessee Valley Authority in May when he succeeds Knoxville businessman Bill Sansom as head of TVA's current 8-member board.
og.title: Joe Ritch elected TVA chairman
